translations: 暗机关；骗人的玩意；花招
使暗机关；搞骗人的玩意

sentences.sentence: It is just a public relations gimmick.
It was no more than a passing gimmick or a fairground attraction.
sentences.translation: 它只不过是个过眼云烟的噱头或露天市场上的景点。

sentences.sentence: If a poster says "A unique show with predatory apes – hamadryas baboons" we will just smile to this "promotional gimmick".
sentences.translation: 如果海报上写着“类人猿独特的掠夺性展示-阿拉伯狒狒”我们只会对这个“噱头”一笑置之。
